card.title: Welcome
card.text: Welcome to the First Date Simulator. To learn how to use this skill, say "Help".

voice.intro: Welcome to the First Date Simulator. To learn how to use this skill, say "Help".

card.title: Welcome
card.text: You wake up from a long nap to hear a phone notification. You have several new matches on Tinder. Which conversation do you open first?

voice.intro: You wake up from a long nap to hear a phone notification. You have several new matches on Tinder. Which conversation do you open first?

card.title: Chat Room
card.text: You open the chat with Dina and try to think of a message. What type of message do you want to send?

voice.intro: You open the chat with Dina and try to think of a message. What type of message do you want to send?

card.title: Comedic Message
card.text: You typed a message: Hey Dina do you like hang gliding? I’d like to see a Dina soar.

voice.intro: You typed a message: Hey Dina do you like hang gliding? I’d like to see a Dina soar.

card.title: Heartfelt
card.text: You type a message: Roses are red, violets are blue, you’re really cute, I love you.

voice.intro: You type a message: Roses are red, violets are blue, you’re really cute, I love you.

card.title: Apology
card.text: You type a message: Sorry, I didn’t mean to offend you. I was just joking. Maybe we could meet up some time and I could apologize in person?

voice.intro: You type a message: Sorry, I didn’t mean to offend you. I was just joking. Maybe we could meet up some time and I could apologize in person?

card.title: Game Over
card.text: Dina did not reply to this message. It looks like you came on a bit too strong there Romeo.
card.prompt: If you would like to go back to the previous scene say "Go Back", to try again say "Restart", or quit say "exit".

voice.intro: Dina did not reply to this message. It looks like you came on a bit too strong there Romeo
voice.prompt: If you would like to go back to the previous scene say "Go Back", to try again say "Restart", or quit say "exit".

card.title: Dina's Reply
card.text: Dina replies: My grandmother died in a hang gliding accident, that was really insensitive. Do you think you’re funny? …  You feel a bit embarrassed, maybe comedy isn’t the way to go.

voice.intro:
Dina replies: My grandmother died in a hang gliding accident, that was really insensitive. Do you think you’re funny?........

You feel a bit embarrassed, maybe comedy isn’t the way to go.

card.title: keep at it
card.text: You type another message: Come on I thought that joke was Dina,  mite!

voice.intro: You type another message: Come on I thought that joke was Dina,  mite!

card.title: Game Over
card.text: Dina unmatched you on Tinder and blocked you. Game over son.
card.prompt: If you would like to go back to the previous scene say "Go Back", to try again say "Restart", or quit say "exit".

voice.intro: Dina unmatched you on Tinder and blocked you. Game over son.
voice.prompt: If you would like to go back to the previous scene say "Go Back", to try again say "Restart", or quit say "exit".

card.title: Continue Safe
card.text: You type a message: I like your 2nd profile picture!

voice.intro: You type a message: I like your 2nd profile picture!

card.title: Dina's Reply
card.text: A few days pass and Dina replies: thanks, that’s my friend and I in Santa Cruz.

voice.intro: A few days pass and Dina replies: thanks, that’s my friend and I in Santa Cruz.

card.title: Continue Safe
card.text: You type a message: Cool, do you go there a lot?

voice.intro: You type a message: Cool, do you go there a lot?

card.title: Game Over
card.text: Dina did not reply, you start to think that you might have been ghosted. Better luck next time.
card.prompt: If you would like to go back to the previous scene say "Go Back", to try again say "Restart", or quit say "exit".

voice.intro: Dina did not reply, you start to think that you might have been ghosted. Better luck next time.
voice.prompt: If you would like to go back to the previous scene say "Go Back", to try again say "Restart", or quit say "exit".

card.title: Send a Gif
card.text: Dina did not respond. You start composing another message, but instead attach a gif of a sad cat.

voice.intro: Dina did not respond. You start composing another message, but instead attach a gif of a sad cat.

card.title: Success!
card.text: Dina replied: Sure, let’s get dinner.

voice.intro: Dina replied: Sure, let’s get dinner.
voice.prompt: Congratulations! You won! A continuation of this story will become available soon in Chapter 2 of the First Date Simulator.

card.title: Game Over
card.text: You turn off you phone and walk out of the room in tears. You'll never hear from Dina again. Game Over, quitter.
card.prompt: If you would like to go back to the previous scene say "Go Back", to try again say "Restart", or quit say "exit".
